title: Travis Woyen, Music, Language and Visual Art, Circuitry, Jordan Peterson and Belief, Paul VanderKlay
description:
Well, that was a fun visit! Here are the best links for Travis' music: 

Facebook https://www.facebook.com/traviswoyenmusic/  
CD Baby https://store.cdbaby.com/Artist/TravisWoyen 
YouTube https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6sTf5I1_5VP3fQ1dke7WdQ

For more on the mind/brain connection, https://www.closertotruth.com/series/does-consciousness-defeat-materialism-part-2#video-57481

If you want to see what I’ve been up to lately, check out my Cellist series.

Www.karenwongart.com
